issue.title: [R] Wrap MemoryMappedFile class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3450](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3450). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will support zero-copy shared memory IPC. This first requires being able to handle `arrow::Buffer` objects in R.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3450?focusedCommentId=16646675) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Resolved in https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/b027f5a0ea8bb3f6dcba3746c912e7257244349b (PR title had a typo)
